name: Mirror Selfie Holding Phone
description:
Mirror Selfie [LoRA]

Like what I do? Consider following my work on twitter

It should work just fine with other checkpoints than SD 1.5. I myself used various different checkpoints on the showcase images.

I recommend using prompts/generation parameters like the ones I used on the LoRA's showcase images. Don't forget to use the trigger words mirror selfie and holding phone

Don't know how to use or install LoRAs?
Check my article on that matter.
